name: Monkey Paradise
overview:
Monkey Paradise is a ticket redemption game where players must make a monkey climb up a tree and reach for coconuts. The more coconuts the monkey obtains, the more tickets the player wins.

Pushing down the left and right buttons makes the monkey climb up the tree, and the faster the player pushes the buttons, the quicker the monkey climbs. Once the monkey comes close to the coconuts, the player aims and presses the right or left button to jump and catch.
